attributes.name: TimeLord
attributes.license: mixed; be aware this contains a patchwork of code
attributes.author: Rob Cermak; based on https://github.com/probonopd/TimeLord
attributes.sentence: Port of an Arduino library with many time and date related functions.
attributes.paragraph: Port of an Arduino library with many time and date related functions... Daylight Savings, Moon Phase, Sidereal time, with the SunRise library rolled in. http://swfltek.com/arduino/

readme:
# TimeLord

Many time and date related functions... Daylight Savings, Moon Phase, Sidereal time, with the SunRise library rolled in.

Mirrored from http://swfltek.com/arduino/
